title: Carl Icahn Partners with Andrew Beal in Trump Entertainment Resorts Bankruptcy Restructuring
summary: During Trump Entertainment Resorts' 2009 bankruptcy proceedings, Carl Icahn partnered with banker Andrew Beal, whose Beal Bank held $500 million in the company's debt, to take control of the casino empire. Icahn brought experience from restructuring Atlantic City's Tropicana casino. Trump fought the Icahn-Beal partnership in court, arguing they could not use his name and likeness on properties.

sources.title: Inside the rocky relationship of billionaires Trump and Icahn
